subject: Sim pedals
description_text: Hello I was looking to buy your pedals and take back home with but it says 3-7 days. I’m currently in London till the 8th is possible to get the pedals earlier l? I don’t mind paying extra fees to have them delivered earlier

conversations.body_text: Hi Bnjie11,    Do you need to receive the goods before the 8th? That seems unlikely. However, using UPS Express should allow for delivery within 3-4 days.
Or we can ship it to your country.
